title: United States : light vehicle sales by manufacturer 2017/18
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 15 different Car Manufacturers on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Light vehicle sales in units.
Out of all 2 groups, 2017 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units for Car Manufacturer General Motors and 2017 had the lowest Light vehicle sales in units for Car Manufacturer Tesla Motors.

The maximum Light vehicle sales in units for 2018 that was found in Car Manufacturer General Motors was 29.71 times larger than the minimum Light vehicle sales in units observed in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.
Averaging all 2 groups 2017, and 2018, the Car Manufacturer General Motors is the maximum Light vehicle sales in units and Volvo Cars North America is the minimum Light vehicle sales in units.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 15 different Car Manufacturers on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Light vehicle sales in units.

Car Manufacturer General Motors had the maximum Light vehicle sales in units among all 2 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Light vehicle sales in units was observed in Car Manufacturer Tesla Motors for 2017.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 15 different Car Manufacturers on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Light vehicle sales in units.
Out of all 2 groups, 2017 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units for Car Manufacturer General Motors and 2017 had the lowest Light vehicle sales in units for Car Manufacturer Tesla Motors.

The maximum Light vehicle sales in units for 2018 that was found in Car Manufacturer General Motors was 29.71 times larger than the minimum Light vehicle sales in units observed in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.
Averaging all 2 groups 2017, and 2018, the Car Manufacturer General Motors is the maximum Light vehicle sales in units and Volvo Cars North America is the minimum Light vehicle sales in units.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Light vehicle sales in units on the Y-axis for 15 different Car Manufacturers for 2 groups 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2017 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units for Car Manufacturer General Motors and 2017 had the lowest Light vehicle sales in units for Car Manufacturer Tesla Motors.

Among all the Car Manufacturers, 2018 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units in Car Manufacturer General Motors and lowest Light vehicle sales in units in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.

The maximum Light vehicle sales in units for 2018 that was found in Car Manufacturer General Motors was 29.71 times larger than the minimum Light vehicle sales in units observed in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.
Among the groups, 2017 had the biggest difference in Light vehicle sales in units. Where the maximum Light vehicle sales in units was 59.65 times larger than the minimum Light vehicle sales in units.

On average, the Car Manufacturer General Motors had the highest Light vehicle sales in units for all 2 groups 2017, and 2018. Whereas Volvo Cars North America had the lowest average Light vehicle sales in units.
